From: Cortical nucleus of the amygdala posterior part medial zone (COApm)
To: Bed nucleus of the accessory olfactory part (BA)
Description: Collator note: very strong labeling of the BA. See Fig. 6B, Swanson Atlas Levels 26-27.
Reference: Kemppainen S.,... - Projections from the posterior cortical... (2002) , pp. 735-755

From: Accessory olfactory bulb (AOB)
To: Bed nucleus of the accessory olfactory part (BA)
Description: Within the bed nucleus of the accessory olfactory tract and the anteroventral medial amygdaloid nucleus labeled fibers formed a dense plexus of terminal labeling in layer I,although fibers were also observed in layers II and III (Fig. 4G,H).
Reference: Pro-Sistiaga P,... - Convergence of olfactory and... (2007) , pp. 346-362

From: Cortical nucleus of the amygdala posterior part medial zone (COApm)
To: Bed nucleus of the accessory olfactory part (BA)
Description: From the injection site, a massive contingent of fibers continues rostrally and seems to provide a heavy innervation to virtually all parts of the amygdala ventral to the central and basolateral nuclei. Collator note: Swanson Atlas Levels 22-24, Fig 8I-J.
Reference: Canteras N.S.,... - Connections of the posterior nucleus of... (1992) , pp. 143-79

From: Infralimbic area (ILA)
To: Bed nucleus of the accessory olfactory part (BA)
Description: The basolateral and lateral nuclei of the amygdala contained fewer labelled fibers than the adjacent cortical and medial nuclei (Fig. 3E,F). Collator note: the termination field in the rostral amygdala is particularly heavy from the external capsule-amygdalar capsule down to the optic tract. Figures 3C-F that include the amygdalar nuclei may correspond to Swanson Atlas Levels 24-30, but this mapping may be valid only to ventral half.
Reference: Hurley KM, Herbert... - Efferent projections of the infralimbic... (1991) , pp. 409-76

From: Postpiriform transition area (TR)
To: Bed nucleus of the accessory olfactory part (BA)
Description: Collator note: strong terminal field in the BA and MEAav. -1.7 mm from bregma, Swanson Atlas Level 26.
Reference: McDonald A.J.,... - Cortical afferents to the extended... (1999) , pp. 309-338

From: Nucleus of the lateral olfactory tract (NLOT)
To: Bed nucleus of the accessory olfactory part (BA)
Description: Collator note: uniform and moderate label in the amygdalar nuclei between NLOT and globus pallidus. See Fig. 15A, Swanson Atlas Levels 13-15.
Reference: Luskin M.B & Price... - The topographic organization of... (1983) , pp. 264-291

From: Piriform area (PIR)
To: Bed nucleus of the accessory olfactory part (BA)
Description: Collator note: moderate labeling in the BA. See Fig. 6B, Swanson Atlas Level 26.

Reference: Savander V., Go... - Intrinsic connections of the rat... (1996) , pp. 291-313

From: Cortical nucleus of the amygdala posterior part medial zone (COApm)
To: Bed nucleus of the accessory olfactory part (BA)
Description: Collator note: very strong labeling of the BA. See Fig. 6B, Swanson Atlas Levels 26-27.
Reference: Kemppainen S.,... - Projections from the posterior cortical... (2002) , pp. 735-755

From: Accessory olfactory bulb (AOB)
To: Bed nucleus of the accessory olfactory part (BA)
Description: Within the bed nucleus of the accessory olfactory tract and the anteroventral medial amygdaloid nucleus labeled fibers formed a dense plexus of terminal labeling in layer I,although fibers were also observed in layers II and III (Fig. 4G,H).
Reference: Pro-Sistiaga P,... - Convergence of olfactory and... (2007) , pp. 346-362

From: Cortical nucleus of the amygdala posterior part medial zone (COApm)
To: Bed nucleus of the accessory olfactory part (BA)
Description: From the injection site, a massive contingent of fibers continues rostrally and seems to provide a heavy innervation to virtually all parts of the amygdala ventral to the central and basolateral nuclei. Collator note: Swanson Atlas Levels 22-24, Fig 8I-J.
Reference: Canteras N.S.,... - Connections of the posterior nucleus of... (1992) , pp. 143-79

From: Infralimbic area (ILA)
To: Bed nucleus of the accessory olfactory part (BA)
Description: The basolateral and lateral nuclei of the amygdala contained fewer labelled fibers than the adjacent cortical and medial nuclei (Fig. 3E,F). Collator note: the termination field in the rostral amygdala is particularly heavy from the external capsule-amygdalar capsule down to the optic tract. Figures 3C-F that include the amygdalar nuclei may correspond to Swanson Atlas Levels 24-30, but this mapping may be valid only to ventral half.
Reference: Hurley KM, Herbert... - Efferent projections of the infralimbic... (1991) , pp. 409-76

From: Postpiriform transition area (TR)
To: Bed nucleus of the accessory olfactory part (BA)
Description: Collator note: strong terminal field in the BA and MEAav. -1.7 mm from bregma, Swanson Atlas Level 26.
Reference: McDonald A.J.,... - Cortical afferents to the extended... (1999) , pp. 309-338
